Describe a PKNCA.options option by name.

Source: R/PKNCA.options.R
PKNCA.options.describe.Rd

Describe a PKNCA.options option by name.

Usage

PKNCA.options.describe(name)

Arguments

name

The option name requested.

Value

A character string of the description.

See also

PKNCA.options()
